title: 3 Bedroom Apartment
posting_body: ['Three-bedroom apartment located in a home on the 2nd & 3rd floor of a three-family home.', 'MBTA accessible:', '28, 31, 29', 'Ten minutes from Forest Hills, Ashmont Station, and Mattapan Station!', '10 minutes from 93.', 'Street or driveway parking is available.', 'Newly renovated exterior', 'Front and back porches', 'Will be delivered with a Newly renovated Bathroom', 'Eat-in Kitchen', '2 bedrooms one of the bedrooms has two closets', '1 smaller bedroom w/ a large walk-in closet.', 'Pantry', 'Central Heating', 'The unit contains stainless steel appliances such as a fridge, stove, microwave, and dishwasher', 'The unit will be delivered with freshly painted walls and refinished hardwood floors', 'DE leaded-', 'Lead free!', 'All voucher holders are welcome.', 'Pets under 28 pounds will be considered.', 'Available 09/01.', 'First month $2,875 and a Security of $1,400 are required to move in.', 'Water included.', 'Utilities are not included.', 'Showing available the first week of August']
